definition: to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish

pinyin: ke3 ca1 xie3 ke3 bian1 cheng2 zhi1 du2 cun2 chu3 qi4
containing_words.word: 可擦寫可編程只讀存儲器

sentences.english: Please put a rewritable or blank CD in the drive.
sentences.chinese: 請在驅動器中放入一張可擦寫或空白CD。

sentences.english: I do this by keeping a permanent rewritable DVD inside the DVD burner.
sentences.chinese: 我這樣做，保持永久擦寫的DVD影碟內燃燒。

sentences.english: What's more, you can erase rewritable discs for reuse.
sentences.chinese: 更何況，你可以擦除重複使用可擦寫光碟。

sentences.english: The Te-O thin film as a reversible optical recording medium is a very promising material.
sentences.chinese: 碲氧薄膜是很有希望的可擦寫光盤介質材料。
